name: tremor
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a slight shaking movement in a person's body, especially because of nervousness or excitement: The disease mostly affects people over 50, causing paralysis and uncontrollable tremors. There was a slight tremor in her voice.figurative A tremor of excitement went through the audience as he came on stage.
a slight earthquake: The tremor was felt as far as 200 miles away.

(EARTH MOVEMENT)
